title: I ask to specify the font
content:
Please help me identify the font Cyrillic

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_5773.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/02_4862.jpg)

thanks in advance)))
author: nassime

comments.content:
Please help me identify the font Cyrillic

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/01_3574.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001315im_/http:/typophile.com/files/02_6018.jpg)

thanks in advance)))

As Nick said, that is definitely Myriad Pro Light. It includes full Cyrillic. Here's a link to a PDF that displays its glyphs: [Myriad Pro Light PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20130416001315/http:/store1.adobe.com/type/browser/pdfs/MYRP/MyriadPro-Light.pdf) - Herb
